helper_extract_coverage_parameters_of_spacecraft¶

orbitpy.coveragecalculator.helper_extract_coverage_parameters_of_spacecraft(spc)[source]¶
Helper function to extract tuples of (instrument_id, mode_id, scene-field-of-view, field-of-regard, pointing_option(s)).

Only these parameters of a spacecraft are relevant to coverage calculations.

Parameters

spc (orbitpy.util.Spacecraft) – (Single) spacecraft of which coverage parameters are to be extracted.

Returns

Tuples with instrument-id, mode-id, scene-field-of-view, field-of-regard and pointing_option(s).

Return type

list, namedtuple, (str or int, str or int, instrupy.util.ViewGeometry, <list,:class:instrupy.util.ViewGeometry>, <list,:class:instrupy.util.Orientation>)

Note

The field-of-regard parameter and pointing_option parameter are lists in the tuple.
